course_title: Large Instrumental Ensemble - LARGE INST ENSEM

sections.comments: MUSC 550C Large Instrumental Ensemble - UBC Concert WindsOpen only to graduate students (see MUSC 150c for undergraduate registration).Open to non-music majors and secondary concentrators who are performers on woodwinds, brass, or percussion. Open to other students by audition, with credit, as stipulated by their faculties. May be repeated for credit. The ensemble rehearses MW 6-8:00 and makes four performances each year, with the majority of rehearsals and concerts taking place in the Chan Centre. While every effort is made to place students in appropriate ensembles based upon audition results, those taking this course as an elective are advised to have an alternate course ready in the unlikely case where an ensemble placement is not available. Entrance by audition each September. For more info: http://music.ubc.ca/student-ensembles

description: Symphony Orchestra or Wind Ensemble. Open only to graduate students.
